channel.title: Paper on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content in Paper on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.description: New paper has been published on JALCOM! Fabrication of FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy nanoparticles by high-repetition-rate UV picosecond laser ablation in water Atsuya Watanabe, Tomoyuki Yatsuhashi Journal of Alloys and Compounds (in press). 10.1016/j.jallcom.2023.169896

New paper has been published on MST Microstructure and tensile strength of electrodeposited Fe-rich bcc FeCoNi medium-entropy alloys A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, R. Miyamoto, and Y. Takigawa Materials Science and Technology (in press). 10.1080/02670836.2023.2187973

New paper has been published on SciRep Tensile strength of nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy fabricated using electrodeposition A. Watanabe, T. Yamamoto, and Y. Takigawa Scientific Reports, 12, 12076 (2022). doi: 10.1038/s41598-022-16086-6 Tensile strength of nanocrystalline FeCoNi medium-entropy alloy fabricated using electrodeposition - Scientific Reports

A paper has been published as a first paper on RSURFI Reducing sulfur to improve thermal embrittlement in electrodeposited nickel using citric acid A. Watanabe, Y. Takigawa Results in Surfaces and Interfaces, 1, 1000001 (2020).（査読有り） doi: 10.1016/j.rsurfi.2020.100001 This paper was selected as a Highlighted Article and featured on the journal page. Better and more attractive nickel plating: A technique that removes sulphur from the nickel plating process maintains ductility at higher temperatures and enhances visual appeal

A paper was published on Sci. Rep. Microstructural heterogeneity in the electrodeposited Ni: insights from growth modes I. Matsui, A. Watanabe, Y. Takigawa, N. Omura, T. Yamamoto Sci. Rep., 10, 5548 (2020). doi: 10.1038/s41598-020-62565-z Microstructural heterogeneity in the electrodeposited Ni: insights from growth modes - Scientific Reports

A paper was published on MTLA Mechanical properties and microstructures after abnormal grain growth in electrodeposited Ni–W alloys I. Matsui, A. Watanabe, T. Uesugi, N. Omura, Y. Takigawa , T. Yamamoto Materialia, 8, 100481 (2019). doi: 10.1016/j.mtla.2019.100481
